room_title: Escape room "Robot Toy Factory" by Escape Reality Games in Sarasota
room_address: 6250 N Lockwood Ridge Rd Sarasota, FL 34243
room_description: On the 100th anniversary of the struggling Timmy Tonka's Toy Factory, the new owner announced some big changes, like a complete overhaul of the factory, the elimination of many jobs and new robotic automation to cut costs. Unfortunately, things aren't going as planned. Can you investigate and get the toys back in production before the company shuts down for good?
